item.title: Creating JavaBean Property Editors
item.description: Property editors are a way to make your bean more user-friendly.Â  Bean builder tools can determine quite a lot about your bean just by looking at it and its corresponding BeanInfo class, but they usually have only very simple methods of editing the properties in the bean.
